title: Christmas Cane Cocktail
directions: Empty hot chocolate mix into a cup. Stir hot water gradually into the mix. Chill hot chocolate to room temperature, about 10 minutes.
Mix chilled hot chocolate, vanilla-flavored vodka, peppermint schnapps, and creme de cacao together in a bowl. Pour into a glass filled with ice.
ingredients: 1 (.55 ounce) package instant hot chocolate mix
